name: AMPIRIX
overview: AMPIRIX is not your typical consulting company. We specialize in leveraging an International footprint of highly experienced advisors. Our Client Engagement Advisors work with our clients to find an advisor that specifically fits the client’s needs. While our Advisors are supported by a centralized staff of Analysts, our Advisors have a minimum of 15 years of relevant experience and work in detail with our clients. With an average engagement of 30 days; our model is to provide a “surgical strike” to solve a problem or accelerate a key initiative. Our clients do not pay for a junior staff member to “learn the business”. Our Advisors are hands on business managers with deep experience in your business vertical. The only “fit” is a perfect fit.
